title: What are your Top 5 favorite skins and why?
body:
What are your top 5 favorite skins and why? You don't need to necessarily own them :P

Here's my list:

1. Aether Wing Kayle - Probably the most beautiful skin in my opinion, never use her or have the skin though
2. PROJECT: Fiora - Absolute definition of sleek and shiny. There's a beautiful artistic touch to her too
3. Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao - A really traditional but also pretty looking skin, makes Xin Zhao look like how he should be
4. Cosmic Reaver Kassadin - Really gives the cosmic and possibly inter-dimensional feel
5. Temple Jax - An old-fashioned traditional skin, mostly due to my nostalgia since it was one of my first skins ever

replies.body:
Void Bringer Illaoi: I know its for illaoi but you can't deny she looks sexy af in purple.

Pool Party Renekton: I mean come on, best recall for a skin ever.

Arcade Riven: Particles :D

PROJECT Zed: The unseen blade is the deadliest... ALSO IM A FUCKING ROBOT NINJA HAHAHAHHAHAH

1. Surprise Party Amumu
2. Urf Rider Corkie
3. Snowmerdonger

* french main nidalee (my first skin)
* black scourge singed
* bewitching nidalee
* headless hecarim
* dragonblade riven

i like black colours which explains my top 4. dragonblade riven's animations are just so nice, too bad it feels clunky in game.

favourite classic sprite
* nunu
the ultimate bm is running no skin on nunu and spamming dance while you run away

1. Arcade Ahri (I don't have this skin, but I've seen some gameplay) - It looks so goddamn smooth when her abilities are used so I'm saving up for it.
2. Super Galaxy Rumble
3. Super Galaxy Fizz
4. Super Galaxy Shyvana
5. Dragon Trainer Tristana

Idk, I just love those Super Galaxy skins, they're really good looking.

1. PROJECT: Ashe
2. PROJECT: Yi
3. DJ Sona
4. Eternum Nocturne
5. Final Boss Veigar

Those are the skins i consider the 'best' i don't know if they are my personal fave (Ashe and Yi are tho, even though i play none of those champs)

Although i think that Base Aurelion Sol and Kindred, are the best overall.
